casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Larry McLeod PULLEY 42P04-10 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Mr. Larry McLeod Pulley, for Pulley, Larry McLeod Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Vernon K. Stewart, District Attorney, for State of NC

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of March 2018 by Defendant to a Formal Complaint:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."
